title: Bjp worker assaults a child in Kerala because he was standing in front of their poster.
selftext: Bjp have zero seats in Kerala, imagine if they came to power :(
comments: Am waiting for IT cell comments now justifying thisðŸ¤£

The name of the child is Babur. He stood in front blocking Hanuman Chalisa from reaching everyone.

Jai ShriRam.
Nazi shit, we've to get out there and vote these bastards out
Oops they are already out in kerala, and they are not coming in anytime soon lol.

South India needs to vote against the BJP hard this year. After this year's election and delimitation, the BJP doesnt need their votes anymore. The north's Cultural imposition will happen to the south. They are already being starved of funds.
Let me try, he was farting on the posters and you are asking us to tolerate this!
But the same news channels will not show news of Congress workers assaulting Hindus for standing in front of the poster /S
You know whats worse when u find out the kid was standing in front of his house  and they just put posters on his wall and hit him for standing infront of his house.
